column1: #text=I wanted to go on a trip into the city to go clothes shopping .
#text=So I got into my car and drove to the local commuter train station in my town .
#text=When I got to the train station , I paid my ten dollar fare , and hopped on the train .
#text=As I got on the train , there were two different levels , a top and bottom level .
#text=I climbed the stairs to get to the top level , and proceeded to walk down the aisle to find a decent seat , preferably by the window .
#text=As I sat down , I looked at the window with curiosity as the train started whizzing by our surroundings .
#text=We made plenty of stops , and each time plenty of fresh new faces came abroad , awaiting to get to their destination .
#text=On the train I made a few new friends , and the trip into the city was very fun indeed .
